com.mumfrey.liteloader.core

Class ModInfo<TContainer extends Loadable<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.ModInfo<TContainer>
  • Type Parameters:
    TContainer - type of container
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonMod

    public abstract class ModInfo<TContainer extends Loadable<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    ModInfo is used to keep runtime information about a mod (or other injectable) together with relevant environmental information (such as startup errors) and its container.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean active
      True if this mod is active/injected or not active/errored
      protected static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> BUILT_IN_APIS
      List of built-in APIs, used to filter for 3rd-party APIs
      protected TContainer container
      Container instance
